刀泉: (とうせん) - daojian (bronze coin of ancient China, shaped like an opened straight razor)
刀禰: (とね) - {Shinto} priest (used at certain shrines, e.g. Ise, Kamo); member of one of the four administrative ranks in the ritsuryo system; government official in charge of a town, esp. in Heian Kyoto; prominent member of a town; river boatman/captain of a riverboat; (medieval) harbor manager; bandit leader/head of a gang of brigands
刀背打ち: (みねうち) - striking with the back of the sword
刀術: (とうじゅつ) - fencing; art of wielding swords
刀身: (とうしん) - knife blade; sword blade
刀銭: (とうせん) - daojian (bronze coin of ancient China, shaped like an opened straight razor)
刃: (jin/há) - blade , edge (of a knife or sword); prong (of an electrical plug)
刃こぼれ: (はこぼれ) - nick in a blade (sword, knife); chip in a blade
刃を交える: (やいばをまじえる) - to cross swords (with)
刃傷に及ぶ: (にんじょうにおよぶ) - to come to bloodshed
刃向かう: (はむかう) - to strike back at; to bite back; to turn on; to rise against; to oppose; to defy
刃文: (はもん) - temper pattern of a sword blade
刃毀れ: (はこぼれ) - nick in a blade (sword, knife); chip in a blade
刃渡: (はわたり) - length of a blade (sword, knife, etc.); walking on the edge of a sword
刃渡り: (はわたり) - length of a blade (sword, knife, etc.); walking on the edge of a sword
刃物三昧: (はものざんまい) - (yoji) (engaging in a) knife fight
分: (pão/diversão/bu/wa) - part , minute (unit of time); fun (one tenth of a monme, 5.787 grains)
分かちあたえる: (わかちあたえる) - to apportion to; to share
分かち取る: (わかちとる) - to divide the spoils; to receive a share
分かち書き: (わかちがき) - separating words in Japanese with spaces (e.g. in kana-only books for children)
分かつ: (わかつ) - to divide/to separate; (also written as 頒つ) to share/to distribute; to distinguish
分からず屋: (わからずや) - (わからずや is a gikun reading of 没分暁漢) obstinate person; blockhead
分からん: (わからん) - (col form of 分からない)  I don't know
分かりかねる: (わかりかねる) - to be difficult to ascertain; to be difficult to understand
分かりづらい: (わかりづらい) - difficult to understand
分かりにくい: (わかりにくい) - hard to understand; incomprehensible; unintelligible
分かりやすい: (わかりやすい) - easy to understand
分かり兼ねる: (わかりかねる) - to be difficult to ascertain; to be difficult to understand
分かり切る: (わかりきる) - to be evident; to be obvious; to understand completely
分かり合う: (わかりあう) - to understand (each other); to comprehend
分かり悪い: (わかりにくい) - hard to understand; incomprehensible; unintelligible
分かり易い: (わかりやすい) - easy to understand
分かり辛い: (わかりづらい) - difficult to understand
分かり難い: (わかりにくい) - hard to understand; incomprehensible; unintelligible
分かる: (わかる) - to understand/to comprehend/to grasp/to see/to get/to follow; to become clear/to be known/to be discovered/to be realized/to be realised/to be found out
分かれる: (わかれる) - (also written as 岐れる) to branch/to fork/to diverge; to separate/to split/to divide; to disperse/to scatter
分かれ争う: (わかれあらそう) - to quarrel and separate
分かれ出る: (わかれでる) - to branch out; to diverge; to radiate
分かれ目: (わかれめ) - fork/junction/parting of the ways; turning point
分かれ道: (わかれみち) - branch; forked road; crossroads; branch road; parting of the ways; turning point
分かんない: (わかんない) - (from わからない)  not understanding; not knowing
分が悪い: (ぶがわるい) - at disadvantage; having no edge; having poor prospects
分けて: (わけて) - above all; especially; particularly; all the more
分ける: (わける) - to divide (into)/to split (into)/to part/to separate/to divide up/to classify/to sort out/to divide out; to share/to distribute/to deal out/to dish out; to distinguish/to discriminate/to differentiate (between); to break up (a fight)/to mediate; to call a draw/to tie; to push one's way through (a crowd); (also written as 頒ける) to sell
分け与える: (わけあたえる) - to distribute; to hand out
分け入る: (わけいる) - to force one's way; to push through
分け前: (わけまえ) - share; portion; quota; cut
分け取る: (わけとる) - to apportion; to share
分け目: (わけめ) - dividing line; parting (of the hair); partition; crisis
分け隔て: (わけへだて) - distinction; favoritism; favouritism; discrimination
分け離す: (わけはなす) - to separate from; to detach
分だけ: (ぶんだけ) - in proportion to; just as much as
分つ: (あかつ) - (v4t,vt)    to divide/to separate; to share/to distribute
分に過ぎた: (ぶんにすぎた) - above one's means (station); undue
分の: (ぶんの) - (indicates a fraction, e.g. ５分の１ signifies 1; 5) -th (e.g. one fifth)
分の一: (ぶんのいち) - (after number N)  one Nth part (e.g. one fifth, one tenth); one out of N
分の１: (ぶんのいち) - (after number N)  one Nth part (e.g. one fifth, one tenth); one out of N
分べん室: (ぶんべんしつ) - maternity room; delivery room
